scripts.publish:angular: /bin/rm -rf public/angular/* && cp -R resources/app/dist/angular/ public/app && cp resources/app/dist/angular/index.html resources/views/angular.blade.php
scripts.build:frontend:prod: cd resources/app && ./node_modules/@angular/cli/bin/ng build --prod && cd - && npm run publish:angular
scripts.build:frontend:stage: cd resources/app && ./node_modules/@angular/cli/bin/ng build -c stage && cd - && npm run publish:angular
scripts.build:frontend:acc: cd resources/app && ./node_modules/@angular/cli/bin/ng build -c stage && cd - && npm run publish:angular
